alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 4:32PM EST until January 07 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Widespread snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Huron County. * WHEN... Now until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS... Low visibility and hazardous road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow occurs off and on during the evening then increases intensity near the shoreline toward midnight. Localized high snowfall rates and accumulation totals are possible along the Lake Huron shoreline with any lake effect snow banding that develops. An uptick in winds overnight with gusts around 20 mph may lead to further reductions to visibilities in heavier bursts of snow.
info.instruction: Expect hazardous travel conditions requiring slower speed and additional travel time.
